discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Additional network extension appliances are required when extending more than 8 networks.
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-HCX/4.8/hcx-user-guide/GUID-0C746416-850E-46F7-85DD-4D4326A23785.html

questions.question_text:
A cloud administrator is looking to migrate several dozen workloads from their on-premises location to a VMware public cloud using VMware HCX. A total of nine networks will need to be stretched for the migration. They will also be utilizing the capabilities of the WAN appliance for the migration.
HCX appliance requirements are as follows:

• HCX Manager: 4 vCPU, 12GB Memory
• HCX-IX Interconnect: 8 vCPU, 3GB Memory
• HCX Network Extension: 8 vCPU, 3GB Memory
• HCX WAN Optimization: 8 vCPU, 14GB Memory

What are the on-premises vCPU and memory component requirements for this VMware HCX deployment?
Which two statements depict the VMware Multi-Cloud vision? (Choose two.)

choices.D: Modernize applications in the cloud of choice using the cloud-native services of that cloud provider.
choices.A: Reduce the number of developers to increase productivity.
choices.E: Deliver a consistent management and operations layer across any cloud.
choices.C: Standardize at the DevSecOps and infrastructure level.
choices.B: Run the workloads in the cloud to eliminate security issues.

discussion.content: I think the answer is D and E.

Selected Answer: D
D is correct

Selected Answer: D
D is the correct answer

Selected Answer: D
D seems to make the most sense.

Selected Answer: D
D is correct

questions.question_text:
A company needs to increase its infrastructure capacity quickly to accommodate their rapid business growth.
Which cloud use case describes their requirement?

A cloud administrator is deploying a new private cloud in Google Cloud VMware Engine and wants to allow for maximum growth.

What are two valid subnet sizes that meet the requirement for the VMware vSphere/vSAN subnet? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BD
https://cloud.google.com/vmware-engine/docs/quickstart-networking-requirements

IP Plan 2.0 supports /20

Selected Answer: DE
D&E are correct.
Google doesnt support /20. CIDR notations must be between /21 and /24. so the correct answer is /21 and /22

comments.content:
From November 2022, IP Plan version 2.0 also supports /20.
https://cloud.google.com/vmware-engine/docs/quickstart-networking-requirements

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Correct answer is C

choices.C: VMware Cloud on AWS software-defined data center (SDDC) does NOT reveal the on-premises inventory.
choices.B: Centralized administration is available through the VMware vSphere Client.
choices.D: The on-premises VMware vSphere version must be vSphere 6.5 or later.
choices.A: Minimal overhead is required in the on-premises data center.
